The emergence of Epsilon, originally known as CAL.20C and later designated as lineages B.1.429 and B.1.427, was first identified in Los Angeles County, California in July 2020 as a single isolate.The variant re-emerged in October 2020 and was associated with an increasing number of cases during a wave of SARS-CoV-2 infections in the Californian region. As of July 2021, this variant was downgraded from VOI to an 'alert' variant.
